title: Tahini Roasted Broccoli
directions: Place all of the ingredients except for the broccoli in a large bowl and whisk to combine. Add broccoli and toss well to thoroughly coat. Scatter on a sheet pan and bake for 10 minutes. Serve hot for best flavor, squeezing a little extra lemon juice on top.
ingredients: 3 tablespoons fresh lemon juice, plus more to serve
